document.description: By starting at the end, it helped identify the important events or landmarks in the story before jumping into the next step. A great thing about working with primary sources is the journey has not already been determined, whereas secondary sources have already been focused on a topic or theme.

document.description: Historical method is the collection of techniques and guidelines that historians use to research and write histories of the past.
